actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Ballistic Missile, Nuclear, Chemical, and Biological Weapons Nonproliferation Support Act of 1991".
short_title: Ballistic Missile, Nuclear, Chemical, and Biological Weapons Nonproliferation Support Act of 1991

summary.text: Ballistic Missile, Nuclear, Chemical, Biological Weapons Nonproliferation Support Act of 1991 - Prohibits the import of goods or services into the United States or its territories or possessions that are produced or provided by companies that knowingly participated in the Iraqi or North Korean programs to develop ballistic missiles or nuclear, chemical, or biological weapons. States that the President should request international cooperation to halt further assistance to Iraq or North Korea.

titles.title: Ballistic Missile, Nuclear, Chemical, and Biological Weapons Nonproliferation Support Act of 1991
A bill entitled the "Ballistic Missile, Nuclear, Chemical, and Biological Weapons Nonproliferation Support Act of 1991".
